enumeratedValue.description: Abort existing transfer and do not start a new one

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Treat a received NACK as an ACK

enumeratedValue.description: Match is enabled: first data word equals MDMR[MATCH0] OR MDMR[MATCH1]

enumeratedValue.name: ANY_DATA_WORD_EQUALS_MATCH0_OR_MATCH1
enumeratedValue.description: Match is enabled: any data word equals MDMR[MATCH0] OR MDMR[MATCH1]

enumeratedValue.name: FIRST_DATA_WORD_MATCH0_AND_SECOND_DATA_WORD_MATCH1

enumeratedValue.description: Match is enabled: (any data word equals MDMR[MATCH0]) AND (next data word equals MDMR[MATCH1)

enumeratedValue.name: FIRST_DATA_WORD_AND_MATCH1_EQUALS_MATCH0_AND_MATCH1
enumeratedValue.description: Match is enabled: (first data word AND MDMR[MATCH1]) equals (MDMR[MATCH0] AND MDMR[MATCH1])

enumeratedValue.name: ANY_DATA_WORD_AND_MATCH1_EQUALS_MATCH0_AND_MATCH1
enumeratedValue.description: Match is enabled: (any data word AND MDMR[MATCH1]) equals (MDMR[MATCH0] AND MDMR[MATCH1])

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValue.description: Co-channel counter/timers cannot force a re-initialization of this counter/timer

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValue.description: Co-channel counter/timers may force a re-initialization of this counter/timer

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_ROLLOVER
enumeratedValue.description: Count until roll over at $FFFF and then continue by re-initializing the counter from the LOAD register.

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_COMPARE
enumeratedValue.description: Count until compare, then re-initialize using the LOAD register. If counting up, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP1 value. If counting down, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP2 value. When output mode $4 is used, alternating values of COMP1 and COMP2 are used to generate successful comparisons. For example, the counter counts until a COMP1 value is reached, re-initializes, counts until COMP2 value is reached, re-initializes, counts until COMP1 value is reached, and so on.

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_COMPARE
enumeratedValue.description: Count until compare and then stop. If counting up, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP1 value. If counting down, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP2 value. When output mode $4 is used, the counter re-initializes after reaching the COMP1 value, continues to count to the COMP2 value, and then stops.

enumeratedValue.description: Count until roll over at $FFFF and then continue by re-initializing the counter from the LOAD register.

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_COMPARE
enumeratedValue.description: Count until compare, then re-initialize using the LOAD register. If counting up, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP1 value. If counting down, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP2 value. When output mode $4 is used, alternating values of COMP1 and COMP2 are used to generate successful comparisons. For example, the counter counts until a COMP1 value is reached, re-initializes, counts until COMP2 value is reached, re-initializes, counts until COMP1 value is reached, and so on.

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_COMPARE
enumeratedValue.description: Count until compare and then stop. If counting up, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP1 value. If counting down, a successful compare occurs when the counter reaches a COMP2 value. When output mode $4 is used, the counter re-initializes after reaching the COMP1 value, continues to count to the COMP2 value, and then stops.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The ULPADC is IDLE. There are no pending triggers to service and no active commands are being processed.

enumeratedValue.name: BUSY
enumeratedValue.description: The ULPADC is processing a conversion, running through the power up delay, or servicing a trigger.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Command (sequence) associated with Trigger 0 currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Command (sequence) associated with Trigger 1 currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIG_2
enumeratedValue.description: Command (sequence) associated with Trigger 2 currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIG_3
enumeratedValue.description: Command (sequence) associated with Trigger 3 currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_COMMAND_ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: No command is currently in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: COMMAND_x_3
enumeratedValue.description: Associated command number is currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: COMMAND_x_4
enumeratedValue.description: Associated command number is currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: COMMAND_x_5
enumeratedValue.description: Associated command number is currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: COMMAND_x_6
enumeratedValue.description: Associated command number is currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: COMMAND_x_7
enumeratedValue.description: Associated command number is currently being executed.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: FIFO 0 watermark interrupts are not enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: FIFO 0 overflow interrupts are not enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: FIFO1 watermark interrupts are not enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: No result FIFO1 overflow has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: At least one result FIFO1 overflow has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_0_COMPLETE_ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger completion interrupts are enabled for trigger source 0 only.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_1_COMPLETE_ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger completion interrupts are enabled for trigger source 1 only.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_3
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_4
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_5
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_6
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_7
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_8
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRIGGER_x_COMPLETE_ENABLED_9
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger completion interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ALL_TRIGGER_COMPLETES_ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger completion interrupts are enabled for every trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ABORT_CURRENT_ON_PRIORITY
enumeratedValue.description: If a higher priority trigger is detected during command processing, the current conversion is aborted and the new command specified by the trigger is started.

enumeratedValue.name: FINISH_CURRENT_ON_PRIORITY
enumeratedValue.description: If a higher priority trigger is received during command processing, the current command is stopped after completing the current conversion. If averaging is enabled, the averaging loop will be completed. However, CMDHa[LOOP] will be ignored and the higher priority trigger will be serviced.

enumeratedValue.name: FINISH_SEQUENCE_ON_PRIORITY
enumeratedValue.description: If a higher priority trigger is received during command processing, the current command will be completed (averaging, looping, compare) before servicing the higher priority trigger.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger sequences interrupted by a high priority trigger exception are not automatically resumed or restarted.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger sequences interrupted by a high priority trigger exception are automatically resumed or restarted.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger sequences interrupted by a high priority trigger exception is automatically restarted.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger sequences interrupted by a high priority trigger exception is resumed from the command executing before the exception.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: High priority trigger exceptions are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: High priority trigger exceptions are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_EXCEPTIONS
enumeratedValue.description: No triggers have been interrupted by a high priority exception. Or CFG[TRES] = 1.

enumeratedValue.name: BIT0_MEANS_TRIGGER_0_INTERRUPTED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger 0 has been interrupted by a high priority exception.

enumeratedValue.name: BIT1_MEANS_TRIGGER_1_INTERRUPTED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger 1 has been interrupted by a high priority exception.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_BITS_INDICATE_TRIGGER_x_INTERRUPTED_3
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger sequence has interrupted by a high priority exception.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_BITS_INDICATE_TRIGGER_x_INTERRUPTED_9
enumeratedValue.description: Associated trigger sequence has interrupted by a high priority exception.

enumeratedValue.name: ALL_BITS_SET_INDICATE_ALL_TRIGGERS_INTERRUPTED
enumeratedValue.description: Every trigger sequence has been interrupted by a high priority exception.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_TRIGGER
enumeratedValue.description: No triggers have been completed. Trigger completion interrupts are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: BIT0_MEANS_TRIGGER_0_COMPLETED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger 0 has been completed and trigger 0 has enabled completion interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: BIT1_MEANS_TRIGGER_1_COMPLETED
enumeratedValue.description: Trigger 1 has been completed and trigger 1 has enabled completion interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: DEM_ENABLE

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_VALID
enumeratedValue.description: Not a valid selection from the command buffer. Trigger event is ignored.
